metadata.title: Landscaper Resume Template
metadata.description: A professional resume template tailored for Landscaper positions, highlighting technical skills and project experience

template_tips: Include metrics and impact where possible
Highlight both technical and soft skills
Keep it to one page unless you have 10+ years of experience

resume_content.summary: Results-driven professional with experience in Designing and maintaining outdoor spaces. Proven track record of delivering high-quality solutions and optimizing performance.

experience.title: Landscape Designer
achievements: Designed and implemented over 15 unique residential landscaping projects, increasing curb appeal and property value.
Coordinated with a team to develop sustainable garden designs that reduced water usage by 20%.
Managed a project budget exceeding $100,000, ensuring completion within financial and timeline constraints.

experience.title: Junior Landscaper
achievements: Assisted in the development and maintenance of public parks, contributing to a 25% increase in visitor satisfaction.
Executed detailed planting plans for commercial and residential projects.
Received recognition for creative problem-solving during complex terrain management tasks.

experience.title: Landscape Assistant
achievements: Provided support in the installation of rain gardens, aiding in stormwater management.
Regularly maintained and enhanced the aesthetic quality of outdoor spaces for clients.
Learned key horticultural practices which improved efficiencies in garden maintenance.

projects.name: Community Park Revitalization
projects.description: Led a team to transform a neglected park into a vibrant community space, incorporating eco-friendly designs and local flora.
